Description: NO BROKERS FEE. 5 minute walk to the beach with gate from backyard! 10 minute walk to wonderland station! The penthouse unit has an open concept chefs kitchen with a sliding glass door out to a large 150 square foot deck. Enormous backyard great for dogs or activities. 3 bedrooms (all great sizes), beautiful bathroom, in unit laundry, dishwasher, gas range, and hardwood floors throughout. Private entrance and up to 3 parking spots. Open house Saturday Aug 12th between 12:00-2:00 pm. Applications due Sunday at 10am. Tenant to be chosen Sunday afternoon.
